original: cayāyāpārthād ayogāc ca āśrayatva asaṃbhavāt // AMsa_18.86 //
analyzed: ayogāt ca āśraya tva asaṃbhavāt
sthitasya asaṃbhavāt ante ādi anāśa avikārataḥ
tathā hīna viśiṣṭa tve bhāsvara abhāsvare ca
gati abhāvāt sthita ayogāt carama tva asaṃbhavāt

original: anuvṛtteś ca cittasya kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam // AMsa_18.88 //
analyzed: anuvṛtteḥ ca cittasya kṣaṇikam sarva saṃskṛtam

original: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti /
analyzed: ādyaḥ taratamena api yāvat kṣaṇikam sarva saṃskṛtam iti
katham eṣām ebhiḥ kṣaṇika tvam sidhyati
ādi ātmikānām hi saṃskārāṇām caturdaśavidhaḥ utpādaḥ
ādyaḥ utpādaḥ yāvat prathamatas ātma bhāva abhinirvṛttiḥ
taratamena yaḥ prathama janma lakṣaṇāt ūrdhvam
cayena yaḥ āhāra svapna brahmacarya asamāpattī upacayena
āśraya bhāvataḥ yaḥ cakṣuḥ vid knāna ādīnām cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ āśrayaiḥ
vikāreṇa yaḥ rāga ādibhiḥ varṇa ādi vipariṇāmataḥ
paripākena yaḥ garbha bāla kumāra yuva madhyama vṛddhau astāsu
hīna tvena msa

original: viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa tvena ca yaḥ durgatau ca utpadyamānānām yathākramam

original: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ /
analyzed: bhāsvara tvena yaḥ nirmita kāmeṣu parinirmita kāmeṣu rūpa ārūpyeṣu ca upapannānām
cittamātra adīna tvāt
ābhāsvara tvena yaḥ tat anyatra upapannānām
deśa antara gamanena yaḥ nya deśa utpāda nirodhe nya deśa utpādaḥ
sa bīja tvena yaḥ rhataḥ caramān skandhān varjayitvā

original: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ /
analyzed: a bīja tvena yaḥ teṣām eva arhataḥ caram eṣām
pratibimba tvena

original: yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ aṣṭa vimokṣa dhyāyinām samādhi vaśena pratibimbānām saṃskārāṇām utpādaḥ

original: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: etasyām caturdaśavidhāyām utpattau ādhyātmikānām saṃskārāṇām kṣaṇika tvam hetumān aviśeṣa ādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ veditavyam
ādya utpāde tāvat hetu viśeṣāt

original: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
analyzed: yadi hi tasya hetu tvena viśeṣaḥ na syāt tat uttarāyāḥ saṃskāra pravṛtteḥ uttara uttara viśeṣaḥ na upalabhyeta hetu aviśeṣāt
viśeṣe ca sati tad uttarebhyaḥ tasya anya tvāt
taratama utpāde māna viśeṣāt
mānam pramāṇam iti arthaḥ

original: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
analyzed: na hi pratikṣaṇam vinā nya tvena parimāṇa viśeṣaḥ bhavet
upacaya utpāde caya āpārthyāt
upastambhaḥ hi cayaḥ
tasya apārthyam syāt antareṇa kṣaṇika tvam tathā eva avasthita tvāt
ayogāt ca upacayasya eva

original: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pratikṣaṇam vinā puṣṭatara utpattyā yujyeta upacayaḥ
āśraya bhāvena utpattau āśrita tva asaṃbhavāt

original: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
analyzed: na hi tiṣṭhati āśraye ca tad āśritasya anavasthānam yujyate

original: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
analyzed: yena tiṣṭhati te ārūḍhāḥ anavasthāna vat anyathā hi āśraya tvam na saṃbhavet
vikāra utpattau paripāka utpattau ca sthitasya asaṃbhavāt
ādi anāśa avikārataḥ

original: ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: mā hi tathā sthitasya eva rāga ādibhiḥ vikāraḥ saṃbhavati

original: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca avasthā antareṣu paripākaḥ ādau avināśe sati ante vikāra abhāvāt

original: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
analyzed: tathā hīna viśiṣṭa utpattau kaṇika tvam veditavyam yathā vikāra paripāka utpattau

original: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā /
analyzed: na hi tahtā sthiteṣu eva saṃskāreṣu karma vāsanā vṛttim labhate yatas durgatau vā syāt utpattiḥ sugatau vā
krameṇa hi saṃtati pariṇāma viśeṣāt vṛttilābhaḥ yujyate
bhāsvara abhāsvare ca utpāde tathā eva kṣaṇika tvam yujyate
bhāsvare tāvat citta adhīna vṛtti tāyāḥ
a bhāsvare ca ādau vināśam antareṇa ante
deśa antara gamanena utpattau gati abhāvāt

original: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
analyzed: na hi saṃskārāṇām deśa antara saṃkrānti lakṣaṇā gatiḥ nāma kācid kriyā yujyate

original: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā /
analyzed: sa hi utpannā vā saṃskāram deśa antaram gamayet an utpannā vā

original: yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
analyzed: yat utpannā tena gati kāle na kaṃcid gataḥ iti sthitasya eva gamanam na upapadyate

original: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
analyzed: atha anutpannā tena asatyām gatau gate iti na yujyate

original: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
analyzed: sā ca kriyā yadi tad deśa sthe eva saṃskāre kāritram karoti na yujyate
sthitasya anya deśa aprāpteḥ
atha anya deśa sthe na yujyate
vinā kriyayā anya deśa aprāpteḥ

original: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārāt anyā upalabhyate

original: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na asti saṃskārāṇām deśa antara saṃtati utpādāt anyā gatiḥ
tad abhāvāt ca siddhim kṣaṇika tvam
deśa antara nirantara autpatti lakṣaṇā gatiḥ vibhavadbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ veditavyā
asti citta vaśena yathā caṅkramaṇa ādi avasthāsu
asti pūrva karma āvedhena yathā antarābhavaḥ
asti abhighāta vaśena yathā kṣiptasya iṣoḥ
asti saṃbandha vaśena yathā yāna nadī plava āruḍhānām
asti nodana vaśena yathā vāyu preritānām tṛṇa ādīnām

original: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
analyzed: asti svabhāva vaśena yathā vāyoḥ tiryaggamanam agneḥ ūrdhvam jvalanam apām nimne syandanam
asti anubhāvena yathā mantra auṣadha anubhāvena
keṣāṃcid ayaskānta anubhāvena ayasām
ṛddhi anubhāvena ṛddhimatām
sa bīja abīja bhāvena utpattau kṣaṇika tvam veditavyam
sthita ayogāt carama asaṃbhavāt ca

original: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate /
analyzed: na hi pratikṣaṇam hetu bhāvam antareṇa tathā sthitasya anyasmin kāle punar bīja bhāvaḥ yujyate
nirbīja tvam vā carame kṣaṇe

original: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ /
analyzed: na ca śakyam pūrvam sa bīja tvam carame kṣaṇe nirbīja tvam abhyupagantum
tad abhāve carma tva asaṃbhāvāt

original: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi carama tvam eva na saṃbhavati
pratibimba utpattau kṣaṇika tvam citta anuvṛttitaḥ veditavyam
pratikṣaṇam citta vaśena tad utpādāt

original: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti /
analyzed: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikam sarva saṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti
bāhyasya idānīm kṣaṇika tvam tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ sādhayati
bhūtānām ṣaḍvidha arthasya kṣaṇika tvam vidhīyate

original: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ // AMsa_18.89 //
analyzed: śoṣa vṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca cala tvāt vṛddhi hānitaḥ
tad saṃbhavāt pṛthivyāḥ ca pariṇāma catuṣṭayāt
varṇa gandha rasa sparśa tulya tvāt ca tathā eva tat
indhana adhīna vṛtti tvāt tāratamya upalabdhitaḥ

original: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ // AMsa_18.91 //
analyzed: citta anuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikam bāhyam api atas
kim punar tat bāhyam
catvāri mahābhūtāni
ṣaḍvidhaḥ ca arthaḥ
varṇa gandha rasa sparśa śabdāḥ dharma āyatanikam ca rūpam

original: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: atas bhūtānām ṣaḍvidha arthasya ca kṣaṇika tvam vidhīyate
katham vidhīyate
apām tāvat śoṣa vṛddheḥ
utsaraḥ taḍāga ādiṣu apām krameṇa vṛddhiḥ
śoṣaḥ ca upalabhyate

original: tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: tat ca ubhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇam pariṇāmam na syāt paścāt viśeṣa kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca /
analyzed: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca cala tvāt vṛddhi hānitaḥ ca

original: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat /
analyzed: na hi avasthitasya cala tvam syāt tad svabhāvāt iti prasādhitam etat
na ca vṛddhi hrāsau tathā eva avasthi tvāt
pṛthivyāḥ tad saṃbhavāt pariṇāma catuṣṭayāt ca

original: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca /
analyzed: tat śabena apaḥ ca gṛhyante vāyuḥ ca

original: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
analyzed: adbhyaḥ hi vāyu sahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivarta kāle
tasmāt tad phala tvāt sā api kṣaṇikā veditavyā
caturvidhaḥ ca pariṇāmaḥ pṛthivyāḥ upalabhyate
karma kṛtaḥ sattvānām karma viśeṣāt
upakram amakṛtaḥ praha ādibhiḥ
bhūta kṛtaḥ gni ādibhiḥ
kāla kṛtaḥ kāla antara pariṇāmataḥ

original: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: sa ca antareṇa pratikṣaṇam anya utpattim na yujyate vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: varṇa gandha rasa sparśānām pṛthivī ādibhiḥ tulya kāraṇa tvāt tathā eva kaṇika tvam veditavyam
tejasaḥ punar kṣaṇika tvam indhana adhīna vṛtti tvāt

original: (Msa 154) na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: na hi tejasi utpanne tejaḥ saha utpannam indhanam tathā eva avatiṣṭhate

original: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
analyzed: na ca dagdha indhanam tejaḥ sthātum samartham
mā bhūt ante pi an indhanasya avasthānam iti

original: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ /
analyzed: śloka badha anurodhāt varṇa ādīnām pūrvam abhidhānam paścāt tejasaḥ

original: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve pratikṣaṇamandataratamopalabdhiḥ  #
analyzed: śabdaḥ punar yaḥ pi kāla antaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭha ādīnām tasya api kṣaṇika tvam veditavyam tāratamya upalabdheḥ na hi asati kṣaṇika tve pratikṣaṇa mandataratama upalabdhiḥ
syāt

original: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
analyzed: dharmāyatanikasya api rūpasya kṣaṇika tvam prasiddham eva citta anuvṛtteḥ yathā pūrvam uktam
tasmāt bāhyam api kṣaṇikatvam prasiddham

original: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā /
analyzed: pṛcchrayate khalu api sarva saṃskārāṇām kṣaṇika tvam sidhyati katham kṛtvā
idam tāvat ayam akṣaṇika vādī praṣṭavyaḥ

original: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti /
analyzed: kasmāt bhavān anitya tvam icchati na kṣaṇika tvam na icchati iti

original: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam vadet pratikṣaṇam anya tvasya agrahaṇāt iti saḥ idam syāt vacanīyaḥ

original: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate /
analyzed: prasiddha kṣaṇika bhāveṣu api pradīpa ādiṣu niścala avasthāyām tad agrahaṇāt akṣaṇika tvam kasmāt nā iṣyate

original: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti /
analyzed: yadi evam vadet pūrvavat paścāt agrahaṇāt iti
saḥ idam syāt vacanīyaḥ
saṃskārāṇām api kasmāt evam na iṣyate

original: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti /
analyzed: yadi evam vadet vilakṣaṇa tvāt pradīpa ādi tad anya saṃskārāṇām iti
saḥ idam syāt vacanīyaḥ

original: dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
analyzed: dvidham hi vailakṣaṇyam svabhāva vailakṣaṇyam vṛtti vailakṣaṇyam ca

original: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
analyzed: tat yadi tāvat svabhāva vailakṣaṇyam abhipretam atas eva dṛṣṭānta tvam yujyate

original: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti /
analyzed: na hi tad svabhāvaḥ eva tasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gauḥ vā goḥ iti

original: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: atha vṛtta vailakṣaṇyam atas eva dṛṣṭānta tvam pradīpa pradīpānām prasiddha tvāt
kṣaṇika tva anuvṛtteḥ punar saḥ idam praṣṭavyaḥ

original: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti /
analyzed: kaccit icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yāna āruḍhaḥ gacchet iti
yadi na u hi iti vadet
saḥ idam syāt vacanīyaḥ

original: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tat āśritam vijñānam prabandhena gacchati iti na yujyate

original: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti /
analyzed: yadi evam vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭam varti saṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyāḥ avathānam iti
saḥ idam syāt vacanīyaḥ

original: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti /
analyzed: na dṛṣṭam tad prabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇam vikāra utpatteḥ iti

original: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti /
analyzed: yadi evam vadet sati kaṇika tve saṃskārāṇām kasmāt pradīpāt iva kṣaṇika tvam na siddham iti
saḥ idam vacanīyaḥ viparyāsa vastu tvāt

original: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate /
analyzed: sadṛśa saṃtati prabandha vṛttyā hi kṣaṇika tvam eṣām na prajñāyate

original: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate /
analyzed: yatas sati api aparāparatve tat evā idam iti viparyāsaḥ jāyate

original: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: itarathā hi anitya nitya viparyāsaḥ na syāt tad abhāve saṃkleśaḥ na syāt kutas punar vyavadānam iti evam paryanuyogataḥ pi kṣaṇika tvam sarva saṃskārāṇām
prasiddham
pudgala nairātmya prasādhana artham nairātmya vibhāge dvādaśa ślokaḥ

original: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
analyzed: prajñapti astitayā vācyaḥ pudgalaḥ dravyataḥ na tu
na upalambhāt viparyāsāt saṃkleśāt kliṣṭa hetutaḥ
ekatva anyatvataḥ vācyaḥ tasmāt doṣa dvayāt asau

original: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasyāsaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānam iti /
analyzed: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasya asaṅgam a pratihatam jñānam iti
jñāna saṃgṛhītāḥ trayaḥ
sarvam tathāgatasya
kāya karma jñāna pūrvaṃgamam jñāna anuparivarti

original: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ /
analyzed: sarvam vāc karma sarvam manaḥ karma iti karma saṃgṛhā āitāḥ trayaḥ
sarva ākāra jña tā vibhāge ślokaḥ
tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ mahā bodhim sarva ākārām upāgata

original: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.58 //
analyzed: sarvatra sarva satvānām kāṅkṣā chida namaḥ stu te

original: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
analyzed: anena tribhiḥ ca kāyaiḥ sarva ākāra bodhi upagama tvāt sarva jñeya sarva ākāra jñānāt ca sarva ākāra jña tā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā

original: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca /
analyzed: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaḥ nairmāṇikaḥ ca

original: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ /
analyzed: sarva jñeya sarva ākāra jñānam punar atra sarva satvānām deva manuṣya ādīnām sarva saṃśaya chedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭam
niravagraha nirdoṣa niṣkāluṣya anavasthita

original: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.59 //
analyzed: āniṅkṣya sarva dharmeṣu niṣprapañca namaḥ stu te
anena sakala ṣaṣ pāramitā vipakṣa nirmukta tayā ṣaṣ pāramitā paripūriḥ bhagavataḥ udbhāvitā
tatra anavagraha tvam bhoga nirāgraha tvāt veditavyam
niṣkāluṣya tvam loka dharma duḥkhābhyām citta akaluṣīkaraṇāt
anavasthita tvam alpa āvaraṇa mātra adhigama anavasthānāt
āniṅkṣya tvam avikṣepāt
niṣprapañca tvam sarva vikalpa prapañca asamudācārāt
buddha lakṣaṇa vibhāge dvau ślokau
niṣpanna parama arthaḥ si sarva bhūmi viniḥsṛtaḥ
sarva satva agra tām prāptaḥ sarva satva vimocakaḥ

original: akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase /
analyzed: akṣayaiḥ asamaiḥ yuktaḥ guṇaiḥ lokeṣu dṛśyase

original: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ // AMsa_20-21.61 //
analyzed: maṇḍaleṣu api adṛśyaḥ ca sarvathā deva mānuṣaiḥ
atra ṣaḍbhiḥ svabhāva hetu phala karma yoga vṛtti arthaiḥ buddha lakṣaṇam paridīpitam
tatra viśuddhā tathatā niṣpannaḥ paramārthaḥ
sa ca buddhānām svabhāvaḥ
sarva bodhisatva bhūmi niryāta tvam hetuḥ
sarva sattva agra tām prāpta tvam yogaḥ
nānā lokadhātuṣu dṛśyamāna tā nirmāṇa kāyena
parṣad maṇḍaleṣu api dṛśyamāna tā sāṃbhogikena kāyena

original: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti /
analyzed: sarvathā ca a dṛśyamāna tā dharmakāyena iti trividhā prabheda vṛttiḥ iti
mahāyāna sūtra alaṃkāreṣu vyavadāta samaya mahā bodhisatva bhāṣite
caryāpratiṣṭhādhikāraḥ nāma ekaviṃśatitamaḥ dhikāraḥ
samāptaḥ ca mahāyāna sūtra alaṃkāraḥ iti
